html:
head hidden in a helmet
visor sight reducing
also sound suppressing
with diamonds adorned
when riders gallop
on steeds obedient
when they trample people
kill them with spears
donkey neighs cruelly
fox kills chickens
in fury of murder
among carrots growing
the sun gracefully shines
not careing about it
it gives us the shine
that allows to live
title: Helmet
